definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid
copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]

sentences.english: Commercial scale test of selective precipitation method for Mo removal from tungstate solution;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用硫酸銅沉澱法除去粗鎢酸鈉溶液中鉬的方法。

sentences.english: The fluid used in the study is bluestone solution.
sentences.chinese: 研究中採用的流體爲硫酸銅溶液。

sentences.english: Leaching of copper from chalcocite with acidic acetonitrilecopper sulphate system was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸性乙腈硫酸銅體系從輝銅礦中提取銅。

sentences.english: A solution of copper sulfate and quicklime used as a fungicide .
sentences.chinese: 硫酸銅和生石灰的溶液，用作殺真菌劑。

sentences.english: A hard problern is free from impurity iron in tbe preparation of cupric sulfate from spongy-copper.
sentences.chinese: 用海綿銅生產硫酸銅，其困難在於除鐵雜質。

sentences.english: A new technology of producing copper sulphate from impurity-removed waste electrolyte is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了廢電解液淨化除雜製取硫酸銅的新工藝。

sentences.english: The conditions of production of copper sulfate by air oxidation in liquid phase were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 對液相空氣氧化法制取硫酸銅的生產條件進行了研究。

sentences.english: Copper-loaded montmorillonite was prepared using montmorillonite and copper sulphate as raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 以蒙脫石和硫酸銅爲主要原料，製備載銅蒙脫石。

sentences.english: Iron or steel placed in copper sulfate also receives a loose immersion deposit.
sentences.chinese: 鐵或鋼放入硫酸銅中，也會生成疏鬆的浸鍍層。
